summary: Over the 6‑hour window wind conditions were steady around 15 m/s with low variability but included a brief gust to 34.7 m/s; rotor speed was essentially constant while generator speed showed only minor fluctuations. Power output remained nearly constant (~0.98) yet averaged about 0.085 below expected values, operational status indicators were non‑normal for the entire period, control settings held moderate pitch (~10.5°) with small yaw misalignment (~1.6°), and temperatures averaged around 65°C.
